attributes.action: improve and make the Estate Agency profession more accountable by implementing changes which will make it against the law to exaggerate the details of properties and deliberately invoking false purchasing techniques as well as making it illegal not to pass on all offers received.  In addition to regularisation, we would like to see the barriers to entry raised by making it compulsory that a suitable qualification, within relevant National Occupational Standards guidelines, is achieved before a firm/partnership can gain a licence to practice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is one of the few industries that is not regulated and which has been a drawback to modernisation and development in the housing market because of a proliferation of vested interests.  If Estate Agents were regulated, then many problems which we currently face in the home sale and purchase industry would be minimised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
